explains: v. 养育，滋养；培养，怀有（感情、信念等）

sentences.en: As Tony says, "Depression strips you of any desire to nourish yourself, in any form."
sentences.cn: 正如托尼所说，“抑郁会以任何形式剥夺任何滋养你的欲望。”

sentences.en: Warm porridge could help increase one's personal heat and nourish the body in cold weather.
sentences.cn: 在寒冷的天气里，温热的粥可以暖和身子，滋养身体。

sentences.en: By investing in education, we nourish the talents of our children.
sentences.cn: 我们通过教育投资，培养孩子们的才能。
